SEARCH
Package arcs

Class ArcZero

java.lang.Object
classes.Arc
arcs.ArcPT
arcs.ArcZero
public class ArcZero extends ArcPT
rcZero is a specialized ArcPT that fires only when the connected Place has zero tokens.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ArcZero(int weight, Place place, Transition transition)
    Constructor to create an ArcZero with a specified weight, Place, and Transition.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArcZero

      public ArcZero(int weight, Place place, Transition transition)
      Constructor to create an ArcZero with a specified weight, Place, and Transition.
      Parameters:
      weight - The number of tokens required to fire the transition.
      place - The Place connected to this arc.
      transition - The Transition connected to this arc.

  • Method Details

    • isFireable

      public boolean isFireable()
      Checks if the transition connected to this arc can fire. The transition is fireable only if this arc is active (Place has zero tokens) and if it meets the firing conditions defined in ArcPT.
      Overrides:
      isFireable in class ArcPT
      Returns:
      true if the transition can fire, false otherwise.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if this arc is active. An ArcZero is active when the connected Place has zero tokens.
      Returns:
      true if the Place has zero tokens, false otherwise.
